text:
Claus Biederstaedt (28 June 1928 – 18 June 2020) was a German actor, director and producer. He was born in Stargard, Weimar Germany (now Poland).
Biederstaedt began his career working with Joseph Offenbach. He voice dubbed Yves Montand, Peter Falk, Marlon Brando, Vittorio Gassman, and James Garner. His best known roles were in "The Great Temptation", "Don't Worry About Your Mother-in-Law" and in "Before Sundown".
Biederstaedt died on 18 June 2020, aged 91.
